3: Battle preparations are completed, Commandant. We can go anytime.
It seems that most squads have been sent out for this mission.
Maybe we'll be collaborating with others on our objectives!
As long as it's not someone who doesn't know how to work in a team...
Yo! I knew you guys would still be here!
It's been a while, Lucia! Liv! Lee!
—And Commandant!
What a loud buffoon...
Who's a buffoon, huh?!
S-stop fighting... At least it's not someone who doesn't know how to work in a team like Lee said...
Was that a fight? I thought that was very brotherly!
Oh? I-is that what it was?
Hell no!
Look at your chemistry!
That's not what that was!
Ahahaha...
What are you doing here, Kamui? Why aren't you back?
Oops, crap. I sneaked out and forgot the time!
Goodbye, goodbye, Gray Ravens! I'll see you later!
Haha, roger! Commandant's still the one who cares about me the most!
